items.text: shortens his length a hint, tucks this behind square on the leg side
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and cracks the cut to Miller at deep point
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: defends back to the bowler
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: splits the gap between point and short third man. Played this really late, cut this off the keeper's gloves nearly. Very good execution, picked the length early. Pristine to say the least
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: good stop by Rabada at point, didn't time this cut shot as well as he would've liked
items.postText: shams: "It is really nice to see how Bangladesh adapted the condition in UK. best of luck for all the asian teams on european soil. with the bad days of Sri Lanka and Pakistan, at least someone should uphold as successors." -- It's all about preparation. They played a competitive tri-series in Ireland, which they won before heading here.
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Imran Tahir into the attack. Opened the bowling the other night. Comes in now with South Africa needing a breakthrough
items.text: tucks this shortish delivery into the leg side
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: defends this with the spin to the off side
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: works to short fine and scampers a quick single as the throw comes in flat at the bowler's end. Would've been in anyway
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: driven on the up to sweeper cover
items.postText: Rakesh: "If Bangladesh bat sensibly throughout and put up 300+, then SA will be in deep trouble as Bangladesh have 3 wily, crafty & experienced spinners and SA batting woes against crafty asian spinners is only too well known. We might just see the first "upset" of the tournament if Bangladesh do get to 300."
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: shortish on middle and leg, he goes back and across to tuck it wide of midwicket
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: drifts away, Shakib slices the drive to short third man
items.postText: "I lost my parents without them seeing me play international cricket. So these things are really special to me, and for my family." The only thing more poignant than Imran Tahir celebrating a wicket is Imran Tahir behind a mic. Read all about how he feels about playing his 100th ODI for South Africa here
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: too full, drilled straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: nurdles behind square on the leg side for an easy single
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: shortish on middle, makes room and punches to long-off
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: steps out to slap this wide of mid-off, can't pick the gap.
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: unfurls his wrists beautifully. Opened the bat face very late to ease this cut wide of backward point. Slight misfield there and it really shouldn't have breached that wall.
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: defends this flat delivery back to the bowler
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: fired full on middle and leg, he sweeps and sweeps well, but there's a misfield at short fine leg. Morris the man, right through his hands
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: huge appeal for lbw as Mushfiqur goes a long way across to paddle, hit on the pad but Faf thinks it's pointless as he was hit way outside the line
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 leg bye

items.text: squeezes this short ball to point
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: squeezes this fullish delivery to deep cover
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: eased with the spin to mid-off as they amble a single
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: flatter length ball on off, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on the pads, works this wide of midwicket
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: drifting into middle and leg, he works this to square leg, sensible from these two
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
